DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Processing Paraffin Manufacturer Name Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates the name of the company responsible for manufacturing the paraffin used in embedding biospecimens

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Cleaning and preparation of tissues for further use in biological products._A common name for a group of high molecular weight alkane hydrocarbons with the general formula CnH2n+2, where n is between 22 and 27. Paraffin is also a technical name for an alkane in general, but in most cases it refers specifically to a linear, or normal alkane. It is mostly found as a white, odorless, tasteless, waxy solid, with a melting point between 47C and 65C. It is insoluble in water, but soluble in ether, benzene, and certain esters. Paraffin is unaffected by most common chemical reagents but oxidizes readily._A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Cleaning and preparation of tissues for further use in biological products.

Concepts.definition: Cleaning and preparation of tissues for further use in biological products.

It is mostly found as a white, odorless, tasteless, waxy solid, with a melting point between 47C and 65C. It is insoluble in water, but soluble in ether, benzene, and certain esters. Paraffin is unaffected by most common chemical reagents but oxidizes readily.:A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.

Concepts.definition: A common name for a group of high molecular weight alkane hydrocarbons with the general formula CnH2n+2, where n is between 22 and 27. Paraffin is also a technical name for an alkane in general, but in most cases it refers specifically to a linear, or normal alkane. It is mostly found as a white, odorless, tasteless, waxy solid, with a melting point between 47C and 65C. It is insoluble in water, but soluble in ether, benzene, and certain esters. Paraffin is unaffected by most common chemical reagents but oxidizes readily.
A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.
